Get started

This site and its content are still in development

Custom elements

A simple library of css-classes supported by some javascript, making webdevelopment easier.

Get started by just adding the script to your websites head

Get started

It's easy as copy-pasting some text.

Get started

Easy to use

You can start using Custom Elements by addding classes to html-elements, so you don't have to worry about writing css.
